points.title: Your profile is combined across various products
points.analysis: "King may share your information with King group companies". These include Activision Blizzard, Inc; The Call of Duty League, LLC; The Overwatch League, LLC; Major League Gaming Corp.

case.title: Your profile is combined across various products
case.localized_title: Votre profil est combiné à différents produits
case.description: When using multiple services from one same company, they can combine these (unrelated) information sources about you to build up a single richer user profile about you.

points.title: The service has a no refund policy

case.title: The service has a no refund policy
case.localized_title: Le service est soumis à une politique de non-remboursement
case.description: Payments are final and can't be refunded unless required by law.

points.title: Failure to enforce any provision of the Terms of Service does not constitute a waiver of such provision

case.title: Failure to enforce any provision of the Terms of Service does not constitute a waiver of such provision
case.localized_title: Le fait de ne pas appliquer une disposition des conditions d'utilisation ne constitue pas une renonciation à cette disposition.
case.description: Even if the service does not or not always enforce all of the rules or provisions contained in its terms, they still apply. Users can at a later time still be held accountable for violating provisions that have not been enforced consistently.

points.title: Your account can be deleted without prior notice and without a reason

case.title: Your account can be deleted or permanently suspended without prior notice and without a reason
case.localized_title: Votre compte peut être supprimé sans préavis et sans raison.
case.description: At any time, your account can be terminated without explanation and without warning by the service.

points.title: You are forced into binding arbitration in case of disputes

case.title: You are forced into binding arbitration in case of disputes
case.localized_title: Vous êtes contraint de recourir à l'arbitrage obligatoire en cas de litige
case.description: This service forces users to use their own contracted arbitrator and forces users to waive their rights to jury trial.

points.title: You are prohibited from sending chain letters, junk mail, spam or any unsolicited messages

case.title: You are prohibited from sending chain letters, junk mail, spam or any unsolicited messages
case.localized_title: Il vous est interdit d'envoyer des chaînes de lettres, du courrier indésirable, du spam ou tout autre message non sollicité.
case.description: Users are not allowed to use the service for chain letters, junk mail, spamming or any other distribution of content to people who have not agreed to receiving it.

points.title: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service

case.title: The service assumes no liability for any damages the user incurs
case.localized_title: Ce service n'assume aucune responsabilité pour les pertes ou les dommages résultant de toute question relative au service.
case.description: The service assumes no liability for any damages the user incurs, including tangible (e.g. profits) and intangible losses (e.g. data), resulting from the use or inability to use the service or any other matter relating to the service.

points.title: This service is only available to users over a certain age

case.title: This service is only available to users over a certain age
case.localized_title: Ce service n'est accessible qu'aux utilisateurs ayant dépassé un certain âge.
case.description: The Services are intended for users who are at least a certain age. If you are younger than the age required then you are prohibited from using the Service.

points.title: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location

case.title: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location
case.localized_title: Votre adresse IP est collectée, ce qui peut être utilisé pour connaître votre position approximative.

points.title: Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent merely from your usage.

case.title: Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent to changes of terms merely from your usage.
case.localized_title: Au lieu de vous le demander directement, ce service présumera que vous avez donné votre consentement en fonction de l'usage que vous en faites.
case.description: The Service infers your acceptance from your continued usage, instead of prompting you to read the new Terms and asking for direct consent. This doesn’t apply to services that have no way to seek consent from users through their contact details or an account.

points.title: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting

case.title: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting
case.localized_title: Vous êtes suivi par des balises web, des pixels de suivi, des empreintes de navigateur et/ou des empreintes d'appareil.
case.description: Tracking technologies (such as web beacons, tracking pixels...) are employed on users and/or the service assigns a unique ID to a browser or device to track its behaviour.

points.title: The service may keep a secure, anonymized record of your data for analytical purposes even after the data retention period

case.title: The service may keep a secure, anonymized record of your data for analytical purposes even after the data retention period
case.localized_title: Le service peut conserver un enregistrement sécurisé et anonyme de vos données à des fins d'analyse, même après la période de conservation des données.
case.description: The data retention period states how long a service keeps user data. In this case, the service may anonymize the personal data after its retention period is over and use it for analytical or research purposes.

case.title: You waive your moral rights
case.localized_title: Vous renoncez à vos droits moraux
case.description:
Moral rights are rights to creators of literary, dramatic, musical and artistic works, as well as directors of films.

"The moral rights include the right of attribution, the right to have a work published anonymously or pseudonymously, and the right to the integrity of the work. The preserving of the integrity of the work allows the author to object to alteration, distortion, or mutilation of the work that is "prejudicial to the author's honor or reputation". Anything else that may detract from the artist's relationship with the work even after it leaves the artist's possession or ownership may bring these moral rights into play. Moral rights are distinct from any economic rights tied to copyrights. Even if an artist has assigned his or her copyright rights to a work to a third party, he or she still maintains the moral rights to the work." -Wikipedia

In general, any terms that use the exact words "moral rights" as rights that are waived will fall under this Case.

case.title: Private messages can be read
case.localized_title: Les messages privés peuvent être lus
case.description: The Service is able to access, scan, review or read all user communications, including private messages, which may contain personal or sensitive data.

points.title: Some personal data may be kept for business interests or legal obligations

case.title: Some personal data may be kept for business interests or legal obligations
case.localized_title: Certaines données personnelles peuvent être conservées dans l'intérêt de l'entreprise ou pour répondre à des obligations légales.
case.description: After the end of the data retention period and/or if you request the deletion of your data, they may still keep it for business interests (fraud detection, transactions...) or legal obligations (tax, legal reporting...)

points.title: Your personal data is used for advertising

case.title: Your personal data is used for advertising
case.localized_title: Vos données personnelles sont utilisées à des fins publicitaires
case.description: Your interaction with the service and data you have shared with them may be gathered to create an advertising ID or profile to target ads on you, either on the website you were visiting or in third party websites.

points.title: They may stop providing the service at any time

case.title: They may stop providing the service at any time
case.localized_title: Ils peuvent cesser de fournir le service à tout moment
case.description: They may discontinue the services without prior notice, at any time, for any or no reason. They usually assume no liability for losses and damages resulting from this suspension.
